label: scalpel
name: sharp scalpel
description: The scalpel is sharp, but flecks of rust-colored blood hint that it's been used.'

label: corpse
name: twisted corpse
description:
The body is twisted unaturally, but there's no blood, except on his hands.
He is wearing a lab coat.
His pockets are stuffed with energy bars and dried food.
His keycard hangs from a lanyard around his neck.

label: parka
name: bright red parka
description: Heavy insulation lines this coat, and every seam is reinforced. It was made to withstand serious cold.

label: suit
name: protective hazmat suit
description:
The suit is bright read, with a transparent bubble around the head
 that would be comical if it weren't sinister. A long, clean cut has opened it from groin to neck. 
You suspect that it won't offer much protection in this condition.

label: frozen_corpse
name: bloody corpse
description:
The blood trail ends here.  A layer of ice has formed over every exposed surface of the body, 
which is hunched over the snowmobile. A key glistens in his hand.
 You notice that the parka is tight on him, barely fitting around bulging muscles.

label: key
name: key
description: The key is clenched in the corpse's frozen fist.

label: snowmobile
name: heavily modified snowmobile here
description:
Parts are scattered all around the last remaining snowmobile. You're not a mechanic, but it looks like 
the gas tank has been removed and a strange cylindrical assembly mounted in its place.
 The ignition is a simple button. It doesn't need a key.

label: core
name: reactor core, a cylinder mounted in the center of the otherwise-bare floor
description: The top of the tube looks like it could be removed. There is a keyhole in the center. Even more severe warnings are written on the sides.

label: open_core
name: opened fuel container
description: The top of the tube opens and more green light floods out.

label: rod
name: glowing fuel rod
description: The rod gleams with a sickly green glow. It's warm to the touch.

label: syringe
name: syringe filled with green liquid
description: This intimidatingly large syringe is filled with green liquid. The glowing is probably just your imagination.

label: fridge
name: glass-fronted refrigerator
description:
The blood trail leads to the refrigerator, whose contents are scattered as if someone
 were desperately searching for something. The item that shows the most evidence
 of handling is a rack containing a large syringe of green liquid.

label: notebook
name: notebook
description:
The last entry in the notebook reads:  "We belive the compound is ready for the
 next stage of testing. Mouse results for muscle building and radiation
 resistance are well above projected levels. Behavioral changes are noticable but within tolerances."
